greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of solutions to +-1 +- 3 +- 5 +- 7 +- ... +- (4*n-1) = 0.
formula: Constant term in the expansion of Product_{k=1..2*n} (x^(2*k-1)+1/x^(2*k-1)).
example: For n=2 the 2 solutions are +1-3-5+7 = 0 and -1+3+5-7 = 0.
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 17 2017
